thread.section_title: APositive Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of APositive | apositive.com.au
thread.title: Kay Sinclair

author: Kay Sinclair
title: Kay Sinclair
text:
We are in recruitment and have dealt with a competitor of A Positive for several years. We have now moved over to the A Positive model and I cannot begin to describe how different the experience is. Our old provider made everything difficult - and every day was like a lottery for our funding amount!!
A Positive is not only great to deal with, but their systems are clear, funding is done accurately and easily every time. Darren and his team have made me trust the debtor funding process again - could not be happier - and thoroughly recommend them.
